content: In practical applications, the relationship between Stirling numbers and standard Bell numbers is very close. Therefore, we have added a definition of standard Bell numbers #26790 , submitted by Weijie Jiang. We hope to receive guidance to enable their merging. Thanks!

Regarding the definition of Bell numbers, we would like to inquire if any reviewer is interested and able to take over the subsequent review work. We will actively cooperate and make timely revisions, hoping for a prompt merge.
